GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles. Default sort_by is descending date but can be specified by any other table column and ordered ascending or descending. Including a topic query will filter the data by that specified topic

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing a single article based on the specified article_id provided in the endpoint

article.title: Student SUES Mitch!
article.author: rogersop
article.body: We all love Mitch and his wonderful, unique typing style. However, the volume of his typing has ALLEGEDLY burst another students eardrums, and they are now suing for damages

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for the specified article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: takes a comment and returns an object containing the posted comment and related information such as the author and created_at timestamp

comment.body: This is a test POST request comment
comment.author: icellusedkars

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: takes an object containing a number by which to increment or decrement the vote property on an existing article. Returns the article with the updated vote count

updatedArticle.title: Student SUES Mitch!

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment specified by the comment_id endpoint. Returns a 204 status and no content

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
